system.name: Focused Command
system.effect: You may have a second Pokémon take a turn this round, but both Pokémon can only take At-Will actions that round. Additionally, both Pokémon receive a -5 Penalty on all Damage Rolls. You may pay 1 AP at the beginning of the round to lift the Frequency Restriction OR the Damage Penalty for the remainder of the round, or pay 2 AP to lift both.
system.prerequisites: Master Command, one of Focus, Guile, Intimidate, or Pokémon Education at Expert
